name: KeyMadness
description:
It's a game about typing the letters on screen. No idea why I chose that kind of mood for the game but I think it looks cool. Also, you can go to the main menu with Esc.

(UI is now fixed)(Gotta improve the main menu)

This is just something I'm doing for fun ig.

The genre is puzzle because I thought that was what fitted the game the most.
